isp.S File Reference

Detailed Description

AVR32 UC3 ISP.

In order to be able to program a project with both BatchISP and JTAGICE mkII without erasing the pre-programmed ISP, add this file to the project and change the program entry point to _isp.

The general-purpose fuses will have to be set to the value specified in the ISP user's manual if JTAGICE mkII is used.

  • Compiler: GNU GCC for AVR32
  • Supported devices: All AVR32UC devices can be used.

Author:
Atmel Corporation: http://www.atmel.com
Support and FAQ: http://support.atmel.no/
